# [Interview #1147: Bands of Mourning Release Party, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1147#11)

#### viridian

At what point did Renarin hear the Shardblades screaming?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He said "Earlier than what was apparent."
